description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 1a by a later hand. Physical description: 29 lines per page; written in miniscule naskh in black on cream glazed, laid Arabic paper. Headings in red; catchwords. Leaves 46a, 95a-98a, 138a, 155a, 209b-211a, 231b-232a blank. Leaves 1, 232-255 detached. Marginal damp staining; some leaves mildewed; ragged edges. Origin: 2 Ṣafar 1119 H [5 May 1707], by Baktāsh al-Baghdādī al-ʻUmayrī (leaf 255a).
author: Sharīf al-Murtaḍá, ʻAlam al-Hudá ʻAlī ibn al-Ḥusayn, 966-1044 or 1045
abstract: Collection of texts on Shiʻite law and doctrine.
contents: 7. leaves 207a-209a: Masʾalah fī bayān aḥkām ahl al-ākhirah.
9. leaves 218b-219b: Fihrist kutub sayyidinā al-ajall al-Murtaḍá ʻAlam al-Hudá.
extent: 255 leaves : paper ; 234 x 123 (176 x 74) mm bound to 234 x 130 mm
provenance: On leaves 1a, 255a, three identical stamps, dated 1275 H [1858 or 1859]. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
dlme_provenance_en: On leaves 1a, 255a, three identical stamps, dated 1275 H [1858 or 1859]. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
